轉.definition: to revolve; to turn; to circle about; to walk about; classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm; classifier for repeated actions

轉乘.definition: to transfer; to change trains, buses etc

轉交.definition: to pass on to sb; to carry and give to sb else

轉介.definition: to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc); referral

轉作.definition: (agriculture) to switch to growing a different crop

轉來轉去.definition: to rove around; to run around in circles; to walk back and forth

轉側.definition: to change one's viewpoint; to turn from side to side (in bed)

轉入.definition: to change over to; to shift to; to switch to

轉入地下.definition: to go underground; to turn to secret activities

轉動.definition: to rotate (about an axis); to revolve; to turn; to move in a circle; to gyrate

轉化.definition: to change; to turn; to convert; (genetics) to transform; (chemistry) isomerization

轉危為安.definition: to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)

轉口.definition: entrepot; transit (of goods); (coll.) to deny; to go back on one's word

轉向.definition: to get lost; to lose one's way

轉告.definition: to pass on; to communicate; to transmit

轉回.definition: to turn back; to put back; reversal; melodic inversion (in music)

轉圈.definition: to rotate; to twirl; to run around; to encircle; rotation; (coll.) to speak indirectly; to beat about the bush

轉圜.definition: to save or redeem (a situation); to mediate; to intercede

轉圜餘地.definition: to have room to save a situation; margin for error (idiom)

轉型.definition: to undergo fundamental change; to transition; to transform; to update (to a new model of product)

轉嫁.definition: to remarry (of widow); to pass on (blame, cost, obligation, unpleasant consequence etc); to transfer (blame, guilt); to pass the buck

轉存.definition: to transfer (one's savings, data etc) elsewhere for storage

轉學.definition: (of a student) to change schools; to transfer from one school to another

轉寄.definition: to forward (a letter, email, package etc)

轉寫.definition: to transliterate; to transcribe; to transfer words onto a surface by direct contact (as with a decal)

轉差.definition: to slip (e.g. of clutch); slippage; also used of economic indicators, statistical discrepancies etc

轉帆.definition: to tack (of sailing ship); to jibe; to go about

轉幹.definition: to become a cadre (e.g. a promotion from shopfloor)

轉彎.definition: to turn; to go around a corner

轉彎抹角.definition: see 拐彎抹角|拐弯抹角[guai3 wan1 mo4 jiao3]

轉往.definition: to change (to final stretch of journey)

轉念.definition: to have second thoughts about sth; to think better of

轉性.definition: to change one's character or nature

轉悠.definition: to roll; to wander around; to appear repeatedly

轉戰.definition: to fight in one place after another

轉戰千里.definition: fighting everywhere over a thousand miles (idiom); constant fighting across the country; never-ending struggle

轉手.definition: to pass on; to resell; to change hands

轉托.definition: to pass on a task; to delegate one's work; to pass the buck

轉折.definition: shift in the trend of events; turnaround; plot shift in a book; turn in the conversation

轉接.definition: (telephony etc) to switch; to connect; to transfer

轉換.definition: to change; to switch; to convert; to transform

轉敗為勝.definition: to turn defeat into victory (idiom); snatching victory from the jaws of defeat

轉會.definition: to transfer to another club (professional sports)

轉會費.definition: transfer fee; signing bonus; sign-on bonus

轉業.definition: to change one's profession; to transfer to civilian work

轉機.definition: (to take) a turn for the better; to change planes

轉正.definition: to transfer to full membership; to obtain tenure

轉歸.definition: (of ownership, custody etc) to be transferred to; to revert to; (medicine) clinical outcome; to reclassify (e.g. from asymptomatic carrier to confirmed case)

轉法輪.definition: to transmit Buddhist teaching; chakram or chakka (throwing disk)

轉注.definition: transfer character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); character with meanings influenced by other words; sometimes called mutually explanatory character

轉注字.definition: transfer character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); character with meanings influenced by other words; sometimes called mutually explanatory character

轉產.definition: to change production; to move over to new products

轉用.definition: to adapt for use for another purpose

轉發.definition: to transmit; to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data); to pass on; to republish (an article from another publication)

轉眼.definition: in a flash; in the blink of an eye; to glance

轉眼之間.definition: (idiom) in the wink of an eye; in a flash

轉眼便忘.definition: what the eye doesn't see the heart doesn't miss (idiom)

轉眼即逝.definition: to pass in an instant; over in the twinkling of an eye

轉瞬.definition: in the twinkling of an eye; in a flash; to turn one's eyes

轉碼.definition: (computing) transcoding; to convert (from one encoding to another)

轉科.definition: to change major (at college); to take up a new specialist subject; to transfer to a different medical department

轉移.definition: to shift; to relocate; to transfer; (fig.) to shift (attention); to change (the subject etc); (medicine) to metastasize

轉移支付.definition: transfer payment (payment from government or private sector for which no good or service is required in return)

轉移視線.definition: to shift one's eyes; (fig.) to shift one's attention; to divert attention

轉移陣地.definition: to move one's base (of operations); to reposition; to relocate

轉紐.definition: organ stop (button activating a row of pipes)

轉而.definition: to turn to (sth else); to switch to

轉背.definition: to turn one's back; to turn around; fig. change in a very short time

轉腰子.definition: (coll.) to pace around nervously; to speak indirectly; to beat about the bush

轉臉.definition: to turn one's head; in no time; in the twinkling of an eye

轉蛋.definition: toy in a capsule (dispensed from a vending machine)

轉製.definition: to convert; to reprocess; to turn (sth) into

轉角.definition: bend in a street; corner; to turn a corner

轉診.definition: to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)

轉調.definition: (music) to change key; modulation; (of an employee) to be transferred to another post

轉譯.definition: to translate (to another language); to convert

轉變.definition: to change; to transform; shift; transformation; CL:個|个[ge4]

轉變立場.definition: to change positions; to shift one's ground

轉賬.definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)

轉身.definition: (of a person) to turn round; to face about; (of a widow) to remarry (archaic)

轉軸兒.definition: erhua variant of 轉軸|转轴[zhuan4 zhou2]

轉載.definition: to forward (a shipment); to reprint sth published elsewhere; Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]

轉輪.definition: rotating disk; wheel; rotor; cycle of reincarnation in Buddhism

轉輪王.definition: Chakravarti raja (Sanskrit: King of Kings); emperor in Hindu mythology

轉輪聖王.definition: Chakravarti raja (Sanskrit: King of Kings); emperor in Hindu mythology

轉送.definition: to pass (sth) on (to sb else); to transfer sb (to another hospital etc)

轉速.definition: angular velocity; number of revolutions per minute

轉遊.definition: variant of 轉悠|转悠[zhuan4 you5]

轉運.definition: to forward; to transfer; to transship; to have luck turn in one's favor

轉運棧.definition: storage depot on a transportation route

轉運站.definition: distribution depot; staging post; transit center

轉道.definition: to make a detour; to go by way of

轉達.definition: to pass on; to convey; to communicate

轉鈴.definition: bicycle bell (with a rotating internal mechanism)

轉鈴兒.definition: erhua variant of 轉鈴|转铃[zhuan4 ling2]

轉錄.definition: transcription; to make a copy of a recording

轉關係.definition: to transfer (from one unit to another)

轉院.definition: to transfer (a patient) to a different hospital; to transfer to hospital (e.g. a prisoner)

轉面無情.definition: to turn one's face against sb and show no mercy (idiom); to turn against a friend

轉頭.definition: nutation (plants turning to face the sun)

轉體.definition: to roll over; to turn over (one's body)
